localize.text: 1. You are the manager of Lobotomy Corporation.
2. Your job is to safely manage the abnormalities and produce energy called 'Enkephalin' as the result.
3. You are given a certain amount of energy you have to produce every day in order to proceed to the next DAY.
Employees conduct 'works' to manage employees. They're your hands, so to say.
As the HP of the employee increases, the value of Fortitude increases. You can increase employee's HP by conducting instinct work.
HP (Health Point): Physical strength of the employee. An employee whose HP drops to 0 will die.
As the SP of the employee increases, the value of Prudence increases. You can increase employee's SP by conducting insight work.
SP (Sanity Point): Mental strength of employees. An employee whose SP drops to 0 will panic.
Temperance increases as an employee's Work Speed and Success Rate increases. You can increase employee's Work speed and Success rate by conducting attachment work.
Work Speed: Employees with higher Work Speed complete works faster.
Success rate: Employees with high Success Rate will produce more Enkephalin and take less damage when working.
Justice incrases as an employee's Attack Speed and Movement Speed increases. You can increase employee's Attack Speed and Movement Speed by conducting repression work
Attack Speed: Employees with higher Attack Speed attacks faster.
Movement Speed: Employees with higher Movement Speed travels faster to their destination.
Employees can be promoted from level 1 to level 5. Higher level means that the employee is more talented.
Values also have level that ranges from 1 to 5.
When employees have a certain amount of status experience, the level of the value related to the status increases.
The higher value level allows employees to conduct a work of higher level.
Employee's level is based on the sum of their value levels. Employees' level will increase as thier value level does.

There are four types of work that can be conducted on abnormalities. Among the four types of work, you have to find the most appropriate work for each abnormality and steadily proceed to produce energy.

The work that satisfies the physiological needs of an abnormality. It requires employees to directly contact the abnormalities. Because of that, only employees with high Fortitude can conduct high level instinct work. Employees who conduct instinct work will benefit from increased HP, which is related to Fortitude.

The work that improves the overall environment which the abnormality is currently in. As each Abnormality has different requirement regarding their environment, only employees with high Prudence can conduct high level insight work. Employees who conduct Insight work will benefit from increased SP, which is related to Prudence.

The work that satisfies the social desires of Abnormality. As only limited interaction is allowed, only employees with high Temperance level can conduct high level attachment work. Employees who conduct attachment work will benefit from increased Work Speed and Success Rate, which are related to Temperance.

The work that suppress the existential entity and spiritual desire of the abnormality. As this work requires a delicate adjustment of intensity based on clear and fair evaluation, only employees with high Justice level can conduct high level repression work. Employees who conduct repression work will benefit from increased Attack Speed and Movement Speed, which are related to Justice.
Abnormalities are entities that are originated from humanity's sub-conciousness. We can extract Enkephalin from them through appropriate management.
Please refer to the risk level below when managing abnormalities
Abnormalities with the lowest aggressiveness. It usually does not do much harm, and depending on the situation, it can have a positive impact on employees.
This class of abnormality can cause a variety of damage to employees. However, if you manage them well, they will not cause a serious problem.
Abnormalities that requires more than twice as much attention of ZAYIN, TETH abnormalities. They can easily kill a handful of employees, but a good manager will not let that happen.
Abnormalities that are very dangerous and destructive. They are hostile to the vast majority of employees and can result in dozens of casualties when they escape.

The most dangerous abnormalities are labeled with this class. You must always give attention to these abnormalities. It is a relief if these abnormalities escape, and are suppresed before they destroy the whole department.
Abnormalities have four types of attacks.
The type of attack that causes physical damage. When attacked by the RED type, the HP of the employee will be reduced
The type of attack that causes mental damage. When attacked by the WHITE type, the SP of the employee will be reduced.
A compound of physical damage and mental damage. When attacked by the BLACK type, the HP and SP of the employee will be reduced.
It is the death itself. Strong body and great mind are all equal before the death. PALE type attack will cause damage in proportion to the total HP of the employee.
E.G.O (Extermination of Geometrical Organ) is an equipment made to fight the abnormalities.
There are E.G.O Weapon (Attack equipment) and E.G.O Suit (Defense equipment).
E.G.O can be extracted from abnormalities that have been managed and observed to the certain level.
As these equipment are basically processed essence of abnormalities, they can defend or attack in R,W,B,P types just like abnormalities.
There are total of five levels in E.G.O. E.G.O with higher level will have higher attack power and defense power against certain attack types.
E.G.O with high level will benefit from increased attack and defense against abnormalities with lower level.
Conversely, E.G.O with low level will suffer from decreased attack and defense against abnormalities with higher level.
You can see the highest level of the Ordeal on this day
LOB is point you can get as you manage through the game.
It is used when hiring and upgrading employees.
This button activates the list of E.G.O.
This button is used for hiring employees.
It shows the missions you can progress on this day.
If you clear a mission, you can conduct researches that are assigned to each department.
It shows the information of the abnormalities placed in this department.
The Abnormality that has not been observed is labeled as '?'.
It shows the description of this department.
It shows the research this department has.
Researches can be very helpful for managing abnormalities.
You can hire employees by pressing the Hire button.
You can hire employees of the default level by pressing the Hire button again.
Employees at default level require 1 LOB to hire.
You can raise the level of desired value by clicking on the arrows.
Additional LOB is required when raising value levels.
Higher value level requires more LOB points
You can spend LOB to change the appearance of employees.
Already hired employees can be upgraded using LOB.
You can click on a hired employee to check the information of that employee.
You can upgrade them in the same way you did when hiring.
You can activate the E.G.O list by pressing E.G.O List button.
It is an equipment that changes the attack damage of an employee.
It is equipment that changes the defensive .
E.G.O's defense factor against each attack type
If defense factor is lower than 1.0, that means that E.G.O is strong against that attack type.
If defense factor is higher than 1.0, that means that E.G.O is more vulnerable against that attack type.
You can selectively view only E.G.O of a certain level by clicking on the tab.
It shows the details and special abilities of E.G.O.
Some E.G.O may require a certain value level and employee level.
E.G.O which may be acquired at the completion of work. It affects the status of employees.
Select the empty E.G.O slot. E.G.O will not be equipped if the employee does not meet the requirements of the E.G.O.
Check E.G.O that the employee has equipped.
Drag and drop an employee into the department in which you want to place them.
You must gather a certain amount of PE-Box to finish the DAY. The gauge fills each time a PE-BOX is produced after the work on an abnormality is completed.

A gauge that predicts the Qliphoth Meltdown. Each time an employee enters the containment unit, the gauge increases by 1. If the gauge is filled to the end, Qliphoth Meltdown or Ordeals will be triggered.
This is a list of missions that can be done on this DAY.
These buttons can be used to control the speed of the game.
It shows the history of the work that has been done so far, casualties, and panic status.

Whenever the recovery gauge hits the end, the HP and SP of the employees in the center of each department are restored. However, the recovery gauge will stop working if an abnormality enters the center of the department.
Right click and drag to the direction you want
You can move up, down, left, and right by pressing 'W, A, S, D'.
You can zoom in and out of the screen by rolling the mouse wheel.
You can order employees even when the game is paused.
You can see the information of the employee by hovering your mouse over them. If you click an employee, the information UI for that employee will be fixed on the screen.
Click an employee you want to move. When moving more than two employees, left-click and drag to select employees.
With an employee selected, right-click the place where you want to move the employee to.
Return employees who have moved to other departments back to their department. (Control team research required)
The maximum number of PE-Boxes that can be produced by working on this abnormality.
Different work results by the number of PE-Box
Attack type and damage during work
Change Department (Employees will be able to work in other departments once the related Control Team research is completed.)
The chance of successing a work
The time it takes for this employee's work to finish.
1. Left click on a containment unit
Number of PE-Boxes produced in previous work
Each time employees work, abnormalities will produce PE-Box (Positive Enkephalin BOX) or NE-Box (Negative Enkephalin BOX). Only PE-Box can be refined and processed into energy.
The manager's goal is to find out how to safely produce as many as PE-Boxes from abnormalities.
The mechanism of work is simple.
When recieved an order, employees will move to their designated containment unit.
Each time an employee enters the containment unit, the Qliphoth meltdown gauge increases by 1. If you wish to know more, refer to the Qliphoth Meltdown article.
Please be aware that some abnormalities may attack immediately when an employee enters the containment unit if they do not comply with the management method.
If an employee encounters an abnormality, they may be mentall damaged.
Abnormalities that has higher risk level than an employee will deal more mental damage to that employee.
Mental damage also applies when an abnormality escapes and encounters an employee outside the containment unit.
Each abnormality has a different success rate for each work. So, depending on what you do, the outcome of the work may change.
The Success Rate is affected by the work level and the employee's Success Rate.
Success Rate determines success and failure of a work.
The abnormality that produced NE-Box will attack the employee.
An employee whose HP or SP drop to 0 may die or panic.
If an employee dies or panics during a work, the work will be terminated prematurely and remaining E-Boxes will be produced as NE-Box.
The target PE-Box gauge fills as much as the produced PE-Box.
The number of PE-Box produced will determine the result of the work. There are 3 types of reslut. Bad, Normal, and Good.
The PE-Box will then stored as unique PE-Box of the corresponding abnormality. With unique PE-Box, you can proceed observation on that abnormality and produce E.G.O.
Some Abnormality may cause a decrease in the Qliphoth Counter when you manage them in a wrong way or when work is finished.
The Qliphoth counter can be found in the UI of the containment unit.
When the Qliphoth counter reaches 0, the abnormality may escape from the containment unit or uses its special abilities.
Be careful and try not to make Qliphoth Counter to reach 0.
WAW and ALEPH Abnormalities decrease the success rate as the number of works done on them increases.
The containment unit where the Qliphoth Overload occurred shows the reduced success rate, and you can also check for overload in the Work Command UI.

Containment units where Qliphoth Overload occured will return to normal when Qliphoth meltdown breaks out. When this happens, all of the reduced success rates will be restored to their original success rate.
Every time the Qliphoth Meltdown is triggered, the level rises.
Each time an employee enters the containment unit, the gauge increases by 1.
When the gauge reaches the end, a Qliphoth Meltdown occurs throughout the facility.
As the Meltdown Level rises, the number of containment units in which Qliphoth meltdown occurs increases.
An alarm timer is shown on the containment unit where Qliphoth Meltdown occured. The timer will go down gradually.
When the alarm timer reaches 0, the Qliphoth Counter of the abnormality in the corresponding containment unit becomes 0, and the PE-BOX will decrease.
The Qliphoth Meltdown is lifted as soon as an employee enters the containment unit where the meltdown occurred.
The Qliphoth meltdown gauge will not rise by doing so.
However, the reduced success rate due to Qliphoth overload will still be reflected in the work.
At a certain level of Qliphoth Meltdown, an Ordeal appears instead of meltdown.

'Ordeal' is a kind of Abnormality that has not been refined. There are four risk levels for Ordeals: Dawn, Noon, Dusk, and Midnight. As the level of meltdown increases, the higher the level of Ordeal appears.

Ordeal will hinder the management of abnormality in a variety of ways. However, because the Ordeals are also abnormalities, you can give orders to the employees to suppress the them. For the suppression of the Ordeal, see the 'Suppressing Abnormalities' section.
You can activate the encyclopedia window by clicking on the name of the abnormality.
It shows the story of the abnormality. The story is updated every observation level.
Basic information about working on this abnormality.
Qliphoth Counter and the defense against attack types
E.G.O which can be produced and obtained at the current observation level
You can unlock information by spending unique PE-Box of each abnormality.
When you unlock all information in one category, the observation level increases.
An employee can get E.G.O Gift with a low chance when completing the work on an abnormality after achieving a certain observation level. E.G.O Gift affects employee status.
Achieving the certain observation level will allow you to produce the E.G.O of that Abnormality. Production of E.G.O requires its unique PE-BOX.
Unlike other abnormality, Tool-type abnormality is an abnormality that emphasizes 'how to use' rather than 'how to manage'.
1. Instantaneous type: Employees can use this type of Tool-type abnormality to gain immediate effect.
2. Equipment type: The effect is obtained when the employee equips this type of Tool-type abnormality.
3. Continuous Type: Employees must constantly use this type of Tool-type abnormality to gain its effect.
On every fourth day (Day 4, Day 9...), a new Tool-type abnormality will be added.
1. Click on the abnormality of the Tool-type abnormality to order an employee to use it.
2. An employee will use or equip the Tool-type abnormality.
3. You can order employees to stop using or return them by clicking once again on the containment unit of Tool-type abnormality.
The Tool-type abnormality's Encyclopedia is automatically updated according to the number and time of use.
If the Qliphoth counter reaches 0, the abnormality in the containment unit will escape.
Also, if you violate management methods, abnormality may escape.
Escaped abnormalities are to be suppressed quickly. If you wish to know more about suppression, refer to 'Suppressing Abnormalities'.
Any employee whose HP dros 0 due to damage from an R, B, P attack will die.
If an employee dies, all E.G.O that the employee has been equipped will be destroyed.
Any employee whose SP drops 0 due to damage from a W, B attack will panic
A panicked employee can return to their original state when they have recovered as much as the full SP with W, B attack of E.G.O.
If you end the DAY with panicked employees, they will be disposed of.
If an abnormality escapes during management or employees are killed or panic, the alarm will sound depending on the severity.
It is a situation where an abnormality escapes and applies some minor harm to the facility and employees.
It is not too late to improve the situation. If you are a competent manager, you will able to work without a problem until this level, except the sacrifice of some employees.
It is a miracle to turn the table. The majority of employees is dead, and the escaped abnormalities can't be taken care of.
Defense Factor against attack types of the abnormality.
You can use E.G.O that is the abnormality is weak to, (the defensive factor 1.0 or more) to suppress it more efficiently.
You can check employees' current HP, SP, and E.G.O equipment status.
1. Click the escaped abnormality or the its containment unit.
2. Select the employees. When a certain Control Team research is completed, you can order employees in other departments to suppress the abnormality.
3. You can cancel the suppression order by clicking on the employee who's suppressing.
1. Click or drag to select the employees who will proceed suppression.
2. With your employees selected, right-click on the escaped Abnormality.
You can use the bullet by conducting research in the middle department.
The quantity of bullets is equal to the number of Qliphoth Meltdown gauges.
Once used, the bullet will not reload until the Qliphoth Meltdown is occurred. When the Qliphoth Meltdown breaks out, the bullets will be fully reloaded by the number of default number.
1. Click the bullet UI or press the number key corresponding to each bullet to activate the bullet.
2. When the bullet is activated, the mouse cursor changes to the shape of the activated bullet.
3. Point your mouse at the target and click the mouse to fire the bullet.
4. Click the bullet UI again or press the numeric key again to disable the bullet.
It shows what missions are cleared on this day.
It shows increased status experiences and level of each employee.
Every time you end your DAY, you will receive LOB as a reward depending on how well you did.
The higher the employee's survival rate, the higher the rank and the more LOBs you can acquire.
If you finish the DAY with an abnormality that has escaped, there is a penalty, which reduces reward LOB.
After the DAY is finished, you can choose whether to move on to the next DAY or retry this DAY.

If you choose to retry, both the deceased employee and the destroyed E.G.O from previous try will be recovered. However, please note that the observations and acquired E.G.O from previous try will be gone.
Memory Repository is updated every 5 day (DAY 1, DAY 6, DAY 11...).

Unlike retry, if you go back to the memory repository, your observations to date and E.G.O will be maintained. However, please note that abnormalities and the containment unit unlock progress will return to the state of the corresponding repository's day.
You can choose to go back to Memory Repository in ESC Menu.
Each time you move on to the next DAY, you will have to choose one abnormality to manage.
Carefully read the phrase of the abnormality and choose.
When you move on to the next DAY, you need to choose the containment unit location for the new abnormality.
Each time you unlock a containment unit, the department's unlock level increases.
When the unlock level of the departments reaches the maximum, a new department can be unlocked.
In case of a department opening at the same time, you can open the containment unit of another department without having to achieve the maximum unlock level of one department.
The higher the risk level, the more dangerous and difficult to manage.
If every employee is in a department that they don’t belong to, a countdown starts.
If not a single employee comes back to their original department, every office worker in their department panics.
Office worker effects applies accordingly to the survival rate of the office workers in the departments. The effects vary by a department.
Effect level increases as unlock level of the department increases. Higher levels have better effects.
Level 3: Office worker survival rate 100%~80%, Unlock level 5
Level 2: Office worker survival rate 80%~50%, Unlock level 3~4
Level 1: Office worker survival rate 50%~30%, Unlock level 1~2
If office workers die or panic during and the office worker survival rate is decreased as a result, effect level decreases.
If office worker survival rate reaches zero, the effects are removed from the relevant department.
An employee can gain long-service effect accordingly to their service time.
Long-service effects vary by a department. An employee who gained long-service effects are gifted with the title and a special armband.
However, if an employee that gained long-service effect is moved to another department, the effects will be removed.
Additional effects and a special armband are gifted to the employee who worked the longest among the employees that worked 7 days or more.
If all employees in a department die, the entire department's Success Rate decreases.
If all employees die, office workers will commit suicide and the office survival effects of the departments will be eliminated.
3. The type of behavior of a panicked employee is determined by the employee's highest value.
4. The higher level an employee has, more difficult to restore them back to normal status when they panic. Also, they can cause a serious damage to the facility.
5. If you finish a DAY with panicked employees present, be careful as they will be disposed of.
